message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.CY 

The paper discusses the use of deep reinforcement learning in search, recommendation, and online advertising, which are all related to information retrieval (IR) and machine learning (ML). Therefore, cs.IR and cs.LG are the most likely categories. The paper also mentions the use of natural language processing (NLP) techniques, which falls under the category of computational linguistics (cs.CL). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of DRL in online advertising, which involves the use of algorithms to optimize revenue and user engagement, which falls under the category of cybernetics (cs.CY). Finally, the paper mentions the use of DRL in personalized recommendation systems, which falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
